description: Police say the 34-year-old faces several charges after the crash on Sunday.
title: Man charged after multi-vehicle crash on major road
title_page: A1: Man charged after multi-vehicle crash on major road - BBC News
maintext:
A driver has been charged with multiple offences after a three-vehicle crash in Nottinghamshire.
Police said four men were injured - two seriously - when a car failed to stop for officers on the A1 near Blyth on Sunday and crashed into two other vehicles.
A 34-year-old man has been charged with causing serious injury by dangerous driving, driving without insurance, driving without a licence, fraudulently using a registration mark and theft of a motor vehicle.
Two other men, aged 26 and 59, were arrested on suspicion of conspiracy to commit theft.
